700949f-a.text:
East Tremont Ave., at the N.E. corner of Mayflower Ave., showing, under demolition, James E. Noonan's "Idle Hour Hotel.'
July 9, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.

701438f-a.text:
1206 Mayflower Ave., north of the N.E. corner of East Tremont

About 1925.
